sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> that are thought to be little <radical>tent</radical>s sent from <radical>heaven</radical> are <kanji>hollyhock</kanji>s. They're shaped almost like little teepees and would make the perfect tent for a faerie or a little yokai!
meaningInfo: Picture a tiny yokai using a hollyhock as a tent. Aww cute!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Hollyhock</kanji>s are mostly <ja><reading>あおい</reading></ja> (blue) because they copy the color of the heavens, where they came from.
readingInfo: Imagine yourself in a field of hollyhocks and the <ja>あおい</ja> of them match the <ja>あおい</ja> of the heavens! It's like you're standing on a giant flower filled mirror of the sky.
